heading: We always have a lot going on with a variety of groups that either meet at church, or we have connections with.

list.title: Tots Time
list.time: Mondays & Fridays during term time, 09:30am to 11:30am
list.content:
Tots Time run two popular groups on a Monday and a Friday, for children under school age, and their parents or carers.

The friendly groups run in term time from 9.30am to 11.30am and there is a waiting list in operation.

For further information or to put your name on the waiting list please phone Alison or Alan on 0117 9772016 or email alan_paginton@sky.com

img.alt: A toddler with painted hands and face

list.title: Board Game Cafe
list.time: Third Sunday of the Month, 3pm to 7pm
list.content:
Board Game Cafe is a monthly time when we open up church to serve the gaming community in Bristol.

We usually meet on the Third Sunday of the Month between 3 and 7pm and have games for young and old, pro and novice.

For further details click here to see our website.

list.title: Lunch Club
list.content:
Lunch club is our monthly gathering for over 55s with a good lunch and pudding and good company - part of our Mission of Hospitality.

All from the local community welcome!

img.alt: A lunch plate of roasted pork, tomatoes and asparagus

list.title: Book Club
list.content: We have a book group that meets peridocially at the Banco Lounge on the Wells Road to discuss a good book and enjoy a pint.

list.title: Sea Cadets
list.time: Juniors 10-13 Mondays 7-9pm. Seniors 13-18, Mondays and Thursdays 7-9pm
list.content:
